Lyric:
[00:18.489]Picture perfect memories scattered all around the floor
[00:26.400]Reaching for the phone 'cause I can't fight it anymore
[00:34.859]And I wonder if I ever cross your mind
[00:42.879]For me it happens all the time
[00:48.709]It's a quarter after one, I'm all alone and I need you now
[00:57.389]Said I wouldn't call but I lost all control and I need you now
[01:05.849]And I don't know how I can do without, I just need you now
[01:22.390]Another shot of whiskey can't stop looking at the door
[01:30.849]Wishing you'd come sweeping in the way you did before
[01:39.278]And I wonder if I ever cross your mind
[01:47.328]For me it happens all the time
[01:53.199]It's a quarter after one I'm a little drunk and I need you now
[02:02.909]Said I wouldn't call but I lost all control and I need you now
[02:11.409]And I don't know how I can do without I just need you now
[02:27.299]Ooh...
[02:34.809]Guess I'd rather hurt than feel nothing at all
[02:45.199]It's a quarter after one I'm all alone and I need you now
[02:54.099]And I said I wouldn't call but I'm a little drunk and I need you now
[03:03.049]And I don't know how I can do without I just need you now
[03:16.039]I just need you now
[03:34.619]Oh baby I need you now
